text: here we are seeing president Trump
greeting three American citizens who
have been released from North Korea yes
so these significant moments for these
three men arriving on US soil after they
were held prisoner in North Korea you
can see Donald Trump President Trump
coming down the steps immediately behind
him it is of course the early hours of
the morning what three o'clock u.s. time
and they're just shaking hands meeting
one or two dignitaries there it's been a
long journey for them and this of course
significance of this moment is we know
that Donald Trump is to be holding talks
with the North Korean leader Kim jong-un
in the near future we haven't got exact
dates on that but we know that will be
happening and this moment in time these
three US citizens being released and
these pictures you're seeing here are
directly related to those talks we
understand that Donald Trump had said
that this was a pre bargain that they
should be released ahead of any talks
that take place and you can see Donald
Trump had mentioned several times that
he would be there in person to welcome
these three men home let's say who these
three men are Kim hak sock he was
repelled on suspicion of hostile acts
from May 2017 Tony Kim had been on a
short-term teaching assignment he was
arrested at Pyongyang International
Airport in April last year and Kim
dong-chul is the South Korean born
businessman and missionary in his early
sixties he was taken into custody nearly
three years ago and sentenced to 10
years of hard labor
